ProductInfo.Features:
1) Quad band, Network: GSM850/900/1800/1900MHz 2) Single sim cards 3) Screen parameters: 1.5 inch, 260000 color; PX: 176x 240px 4) Ringtone: 64 chord; Ringtone format: mp3, midi 5) Music player: support to play music by MP3/WAV format, Bluetooth stereo output with pure voice
6) Video Player: 3GP,support to play in full screen, speed/pause, Bluetooth stereo output 7) support 2.0 stereo Bluetooth output 8) Memory size: 761K, maximum support 4G TF card expansion, support expansion Data Transfer: Bluetooth / USB 9) Image formats: jpg, gif 10) Fuselage: Only 250 groups of phone book watch phone supports Caller ID and group ringtones, available to download MP3 ringtones
11) SMS / MMS: Support for 200 SMS and MMS 12) Switching machines: Custom switching machine screen can be set up 13) Alarm clock: 5 groups alarm clock, Monday to Sunday from the definition of arbitrary day clock 14) Support Game
15) Support Sound Recorder / Video Recorder 16) Other function: MP3/MP4, Handwritten input, Calendar, Alarm , Health , Calculator, QQ, Word Clock, Facebook, Twitter, Yahoo, Stopwatch, MSN 17) Language Optional : a) Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English b) English, French, Spanish, Bahasa Indonesia, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, German , Arabic, Persian 18) Talk Time: 4-6hours
19) Standby time : 70-100h 20) Battery: Li-ion 3.7V 580mAh 21) Dimensions: 62.8x45x15.5mm 22) Weight: 72g (including battery)
